docs.summary: The wix-widget module contains functionality for working with Blocks widgets from Blocks Panel code.
description: The Widget API is used within the code of panels built with the [Blocks Panel Builder](https://support.wix.com/en/article/creating-custom-panels-for-your-widgets-action-bar-buttons).
It enables your panel to interact with your Blocks widgets by controlling their properties and design presets.
To use the Widget API, import `wixWidget` from the `wix-widget` module:
